alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 3:01PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Johnson and southern Tarrant Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 301 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Benbrook, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Worth, Arlington, Grand Prairie, Mansfield, Haltom City, Burleson, Benbrook, White Settlement, Crowley, Forest Hill, River Oaks, Kennedale, Everman, Joshua, Sansom Park, Lake Worth, Alvarado, Rendon, Edgecliff Village and Westworth Village. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35W between mile markers 25 and 54. Interstate 20 between mile markers 423 and 453. Interstate 30 between mile markers 2 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
